remarks: Define the ` Ray ` function.  This function generates the set of all points that lie on the ray starting at ` p ` and passing through ` a ` .  Definition 6.8 of [Schwabhauser] p. 44.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 21-Oct-2013.)
statement:
df-ray $p |- Ray = { <. <. p , a >. , r >. | E. n e. NN ( ( p e. ( EE ` n ) /\ a e. ( EE ` n ) /\ p =/= a ) /\ r = { x e. ( EE ` n ) | p OutsideOf <. a , x >. } ) } $.
$d a n p r x $.
